WRITING.TITLE: Xfinity Crews?
WRITING.TEXT: Are there any crews available for the Xfinity NSX17 mod?
Thanks. I did find out that the Daytona carset for NXS17 has all the crews, so I'm set.

WRITING.TITLE: New Video Card
WRITING.TEXT: Planning to upgrade my old GTX295 video card to a GTX1060 or 1070. Anyone have any experience with these and Windows 7 for running NR2003? I'm hesitating since the 295 seems to still do a good job.
I'm getting a GTX1060 6GB today. Can anyone tell me the best Nvidia driver version to use with NR2003 and Windows 7?

I've installed the GTX1060 and tried NR2003. It runs OK, but I'm getting a lot of shimmering on the track and walls. I've done all the tweaks I can find, including Roguetoad's tweaks. Can anyone tell me what to change to get rid of the shimmering? Anything in the NVidia Control Panel?
After doing some more tweaking, I have things in pretty good shape, but always interested in any more tweaks people may have for the shimmering.

WRITING.TITLE: 2018 Cars?
WRITING.TEXT: What sites are left to get 2018 cars now, besides NNRacing?
Do you have a link to download it?
Can you share it?

WRITING.TITLE: Windows 10
WRITING.TEXT: Just wanted to verify that NR2003 works ok with Windows 10. Also, I use a Logitech Wingman Formula Force GP wheel and pedals. Can anyone confirm that this would work with Windows 10 also?

WRITING.TITLE: Pocono 2018 Won't load
WRITING.TEXT: Trying to use the new Pocono 2018 track. I get the Cannot Load Track message. All my other tracks work. Ideas?
I have the 2012 FSE Pocono. Where did you find the 2015 version?

WRITING.TITLE: NRatings Updates?
WRITING.TEXT: I noticed that NRatings has not been updated since the Michigan race on 8/12. Anyone have any info on this?
I found out some background changes need to be made. No date yet for a fix.
My speed is about 10 mph slower with the new mod at Daytona. Anyone else seeing this?

I pared down the large number of cars in the Cars folder to 34 actual cars that will run in the 2019 season. The game runs fine on my 2009 Alienware PC with an NV 1060 and 6 GB of RAM, except for the slower speed so far. Texture size set at -1.
You can reduce the cars 2048 resolution to 1024 by exporting the cars to tga files. I then use Adobe Photoshop Elements to reduce the files. Then just import them back into the game.
Re the slower speed, I have always used Nratings for my cars till it became unavailable last year. So i just now manually upped the ratings on the car I drive, and now it's a REAL racecar!
I tried to message the developer last week on FB to get an update. I got no response.
I can send it to you, but I'm away from my PC for a couple weeks. I'll get back to you after 1/25.
This site also has lots of driver and car info: [http://www.espn.com/jayski/](http://www.espn.com/jayski/)

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for 4 Cars
WRITING.TEXT: I'm looking for these cars for the MENCS2019 Mod: 15, 51, 52, 77. Has anyone made these yet?
Are you using the MENCup2018 or MENCup2019 mod? I'm using 2019. Maybe that's why the cars won't show up?
I did convert them, but can't test till later. I'll let you know if I need help. I do remember this converter from a few years back.

WRITING.TITLE: Jayski Has Closed
WRITING.TEXT: I see jayski.com has closed as of 1/28. I've used that site for years to get current driver/car info and paint schemes. Does anyone know of any other sites that provide this info, especially car info listed by car number? Googling this hasn't turned up much to compare with jayski.

WRITING.TITLE: NRatings Fixed!
WRITING.TEXT: NRatings has just been fixed.

WRITING.TITLE: Instagram Won't Load On PC
WRITING.TEXT: When trying to view Instagram with my mozilla browser on all my PC's (Win 7 and 10), all I get is a white page with the Insta icon in the middle. It works fine with IE. I went to Cookie Manager and deleted all info there, and my cache. It looks like that grey square icon is the initial symbol on the page, and with IE it quickly flips from there to the correct whole page. This is not happening with mozilla. Any ideas how to fix this?
Lots of tracks here: [https://nr2k3.weebly.com/all-tracks.html](https://nr2k3.weebly.com/all-tracks.html)
Can't get it to work - "Cannot Load Track". All my other tracks work. I do have the Shared Folder. Can anyone help?
I was missing the arcade file. Now it works fine.

WRITING.TITLE: Kentucky Night Track?
WRITING.TEXT: Anyone know of a more current Kentucky Night track than the 2011 SDT track?

WRITING.TITLE: Phoenix Track Won't Load
WRITING.TEXT: I can't get the Phoenix track on this site to load. All the other ones work fine. Can anyone help? [http://www.splinedesignstudios.com/SDS\_main/SDS\_main/SRA/downloads.htm](http://www.splinedesignstudios.com/SDS_main/SDS_main/SRA/downloads.htm)
I have all the latest tracks, and they all load except this one. Strange. Those shared folder updates look to be from several years ago. Not sure what to do now.....
Well, I just tried it again and it's working. Guess all is well.

WRITING.TITLE: NR2003 Won't Start First Time
WRITING.TEXT: I've been using NR2003 with its CD since its inception, and this is new strange behavior (using Win 7). When I click on the shortcut, NR2003 does not start up. I don't see the spinning CD symbol, and there is no activity. When I click it again, it says NR2003 is already running. If I close it out in Task Manager, it then starts up normally. I've also tried running as Administrator with no change. Just started doing this about a month ago, and never before that. Any ideas?

WRITING.TITLE: Track Graphics Issues
WRITING.TEXT: I just installed the game on Windows 10. I'm having what I believe are anti-aliasing issues on track graphics. Lots of moving/wavy lines. Cars look good. I'm using the same settings I used in the Nvidia Control Panel as I did on my Win 7 machine. Any ideas on what settings need to be changed? I have GTX 980 card. Also with my Wingman Formula Force GP wheel, the Force Feed settings are greyed out in the NR2003 settings, but the force feed is working in the game. Is this normal?
I also went from a 24" monitor to a 28" if that matters. I did get the Force Feed to work by downloading the Logitech driver software. I will check out that video.

It's definitely better, but I'm still getting some jagged lines on parts of the tracks. The Nvidia panel wouldn't let me turn off Trilinear Optimization - it's greyed out. Anything else I can do to make it even better?

Still can't seem to get this looking right. Things look OK except for lots of moving/jagged lines on the tracks and on top of the walls. This 28" monitor has a resolution of 2560x1440, and I think it just amplifies the problems. I've tried all kinds of variation with Anisotropic and Anti-aliasing settings in the Nvidia Control Panel. Nothing makes any difference. Seems like this game should look better on a pretty new Alienware desktop with this video card. Anyone have any more ideas?
So I just tried OpenGL instead of DirectX graphics. The moving lines are much better, but racing is a little jerky. Can anyone suggest any setting changes to get it running smoother?

WRITING.TITLE: Two Sites Down?
WRITING.TEXT: Not able to access both smiffsden.com and splashngo.studiospeed.club this week. Anyone know what the problem is?

WRITING.TITLE: Low FPS With OGL
WRITING.TEXT: OGL graphics look best on my PC. I'm only getting about 20fps with a full field of cars, and around 30 in practice. I have most everything turned off or down, including no pit crews. All my cars are low res. Can I do any more to get fps up at all?

Using an Area 51 Alienware desktop, about 3 years old. Directx doesn't really work. Too many moving/jagged lines on the tracks and fences. OGL looks much better. I actually just found a posting that has some good tips for changing the NVidia Control Panel settings. Now FPS are 40-50, which works well. [http://www.simracingdesign.com/threads/frame-rate-problems-with-gtx-1080.62995/](http://www.simracingdesign.com/threads/frame-rate-problems-with-gtx-1080.62995/)

WRITING.TITLE: FPS; # of Cars Allowed
WRITING.TEXT: I have a couple questions. Is there a reason why frame rates are kinda low the first couple laps of a race, then go to 40-50 for the rest of the race? Also, some tracks will not allow you to enter 40 cars, seems it's capped at 39. Is this a function of the track design?
It usually is the Shared folder when you get that message. Google it to get the latest version.

WRITING.TITLE: NRatings Error?
WRITING.TEXT: All of a sudden I'm getting an Unhandled Exception error with NRatings. Anyone else seeing this?

I'm getting the same error. I've tried contacting the author several ways, but no response. No answers from a couple other forums either. Guess we have to just hope he's working on it. I'm using Windows 10, and one other person I heard from says it's working on Windows 7.
I tried emailing the author, and messaging him on Facebook. No response.
This is being worked on now.
It's fixed!
It's fixed!

WRITING.TITLE: List of Updated Tracks?
WRITING.TEXT: Someone on here was keeping a very nice list of updated tracks. The last listing I saw was that Talledega 19 was added to the list on 8/10/19. I printed the list at that time but now I don't know how I accessed it. Can someone point me in the right direction to view the chart?
Thanks - that's it.

WRITING.TITLE: 2020 Cars?
WRITING.TEXT: With NNracing pretty inactive, besides Stunod, what are the best sites to find 2020 cars now?

He's working on it: [http://www.simracingdesign.com/threads/armory-digital-racing-designs-will-be-going-down.69880/](http://www.simracingdesign.com/threads/armory-digital-racing-designs-will-be-going-down.69880/)
Where did you find most of the 2020 cars? I only have 15 so far.
That is the correct link.
Do you have to compare each car with last year's scheme then to see if it changed?

WRITING.TITLE: 2020 Splash Screens
WRITING.TEXT: Is anyone working on 2020 splash screens (copyright file)?
I found 3 new ones here: https://adracingdesigns.com/
Very nice job. Thanks!
I'm using the ISM 2019 BBMC from May of 2019. Works well for me.
You can get it here: https://stunodracing.net/index.php?resources/categories/sng-mencs-19.304/

WRITING.TITLE: Newer Darlington Track?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm using a Darlington track from 2008. Does anyone know where I can get a newer version?
Looks like the '08 track is the only day version though. We'll need day and night for the new schedule.

WRITING.TITLE: Tracks for New Schedule
WRITING.TEXT: I went thru the new schedule up to June 21. I had all the all the day and night tracks except for Martinsville Night. I searched and could only find one from 2007, called Martinsville Night Modified. Has anyone found a more recent one?
See my post below.
Most recent day I've found is from 2008.
The application is not working either. Getting an unhandled exception error. I did message the developer on Facebook.
Just heard from the developer. Everything is fixed now, and the races have been updated to Martinsville.
Having some trouble with force feedback on this track. Very hard to steer and keep on the track. I have the 2019 version of this track and it works normally. Any way I can get this track to work?
Using .car and NRatings. Works fine on all other tracks.
Using cup. No setup in garage - just default?

WRITING.TITLE: FS Installed Where?
WRITING.TEXT: I pre-ordered FS2020 from the MS Store, paid for it, and it says it's installed. I see it listed in the MS Store Downloads section, and if I click on it it says not available to play yet. So it appears it's on my PC, but I'm not sure where it installed? Do I have to go to the MS Store every time I want to play? I'm used to downloading files and placing them where I want on my PC. I haven't ordered from the MS Store before, so I'm not sure how it all works. Can someone explain the procedure to me?
I assume when it's ready it will download a a full install file (to the store?). Then will it give us a choice as to where to install the game, such as which drive and folder?

WRITING.TITLE: Missing Options from FSX?
WRITING.TEXT: Up and running - going thru Options. FSX seems to have a lot more choices. My initial questions: 1. How do you stop/start the engine with the joystick buttons? 2. How do you set the camera button to go from one view to another, as in FSX? 3. How do you set Slew mode with a keyboard shortcut, as Y in FSX? Also up and down in Slew? 4. How do you change instrument panel views, as using W key in FSX? 5. Still trying to monitor FPS in Developer mode. Not sure how.

OK I found the keyboard shortcuts in Options, but they don't seem to be working. I have my joystick set up, so I'm not sure how to activate the keyboard also? I think in FSX I could use the stick and keyboard both without much setup?
Y key doesn't access slew control like it should. How do I get slew to work? Not sure other shortcut keys work either.

WRITING.TITLE: Hide Instrument Panel?
WRITING.TEXT: In FSX you could use the W key to hide the instrument panel. How can we hide it in the new sim?
In the cockpit view. So you can see outside without the panel in the way.

There must be a way. In FSX with the W key you could cycle thru panels, and one option was no panel. I'll keep looking. Also I really liked the Slew option in FSX (Y Key), so you could move the plane around and check out scenery. Slew options in this new sim don't work for me at all. either on the keyboard or joystick.
Do you know how to do it with the drone?

WRITING.TITLE: Cessna 172 Crashes
WRITING.TEXT: Anyone else having trouble flying the basic 172? It crashes every time after liftoff. The newer 172 flys fine.
The plane goes into a spin right into the ground every time.

WRITING.TITLE: Answer ATC?
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a way to answer ATC when they talk to the pilot?
I'm not seeing a toolbox. Where is it exactly, and how do you use it?

WRITING.TITLE: Answering ATC?
WRITING.TEXT: How do you respond to ATC when they are talking to you?

WRITING.TITLE: Still Can't Slew
WRITING.TEXT: I can't get into Slew mode. I've tried the keyboard Y key, and using the joystick. All I get is a view of the top of the plane. Some other keyboard commands don't work either. I have an Alienware TackX keyboard and a ThrustMaster stick. Can anyone help?

WRITING.TITLE: Roll Over and Crashing
WRITING.TEXT: My planes have started to roll over and crash after takeoff. I lose total control with the joystick. What is causing this?
I tried your suggestions - no luck. This just started happening. Joystick seems to be working otherwise. Any other ideas?
Do you mean the W key in FSX, that cycled thru panels and also had a clear view with no panel? I read that's not offered in FS2020 for some reason. I really miss that feature.
There is a historic lighthouse on Sanibel Island, FL that has been there since 1884. It shows in Bing Maps, but is missing from the game? How can that be?

WRITING.TITLE: Cirrus Altitude?
WRITING.TEXT: Can someone explain how to see the altitude on the Cirrus instrument panel? I just see a scale showing negative and positive numbers?

WRITING.TITLE: Open Cockpit View
WRITING.TEXT: For those of you trying to replicate the W key in FSX to show a cockpit view with no instruments, I found a partial solution. In Options, there are 3 cockpit camera selections. If you choose Toggle Landing View, it shows a pretty clear view out the window with the instruments still showing a little on the bottom. I'll use this until we get a totally open cockpit view in an update hopefully.

WRITING.TITLE: Weather Time Off
WRITING.TEXT: When I access live weather from the toolbar on top, the time is always an hour off (early). Is this how it's supposed to be? How do I correct this?
Actually the time is always off by various amounts. Are you supposed to set it to the proper time each time you play?
PC clock is fine. It shows UTC and local. Local is off by at least an hour or more. Is it supposed to be exact local time all the time?

WRITING.TITLE: Keyboard Commands List
WRITING.TEXT: Here's a list of keyboard/control commands from Fly Away Simulations: [https://flyawaysimulation.com/downloads/files/24781/msfs-controls-keyboard-commands/](https://flyawaysimulation.com/downloads/files/24781/msfs-controls-keyboard-commands/)
Set up Toggle Landing View. That's the closest I've found yet to the W key in FSX.

WRITING.TITLE: Organize Files In Community Folder?
WRITING.TEXT: Looks like we'll be having lots of files in our Community folder. What's the best way to keep track and organize these? I did see the ModmanFX utility being offered. Any other ideas?
I have the same issue. It's always clear and sunny at my home airport KERI. Live weather is set each time. Must be a glitch in the game somewhere?

WRITING.TITLE: Live Weather/Traffic Working?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm not sure my live traffic or weather is working. Always sunny wherever I go. I see planes in the air sometimes, but only a few at airports. I switched from live to AI Offline (50%) and the planes at airports stay the same. What can I do to see if things are working?

Went to Tulsa, OK where it's raining hard. Shows clear and sunny in game. Went to KDTW Detroit. Saw quite a few planes. But at KRSW Ft. Myers in real life there are UPS and Fedex cargo planes parked at the NW cargo terminal all day. In the game no planes show up at that terminal?
Just went to rainy airports in Africa and Scotland. Changed server to West Europe. Both airports in game are bright and sunny. Very frustrating. Am I doing something wrong?

I now have live traffic and weather. For weather, when you have the world map open, you have to check flight conditions in the upper right. I had the preset set to sunny. I changed it to live weather, and now it works, in the US also. I think live traffic was working all along. I checked at busy airports, and there were lots of planes. The new Mega Pack 8 also adds liveries for the AI planes, so airports look very realistic now.

WRITING.TITLE: Memory Usage High?
WRITING.TEXT: I have 16 GB of RAM, and it goes to 87% usage when flying MSFS. Is this normal?

WRITING.TITLE: Live Traffic Showing Which Airlines?
WRITING.TEXT: I have Mega Pack 8 installed which now includes liveries for AI planes. I now have real airline liveries showing for AI, but for the most part they don't match airlines that should be at real airports. What determines which airlines show up at various airports?
Livery Mega Pack 8 now includes AI liveries also.
I had this exact issue, especially with the Cessna's. I found out my takeoff speed was too slow. Now I'm taking off faster and watching my climb out angle, and no more spins and crashes on takeoff.

WRITING.TITLE: No Menu Bar With Saved Flights
WRITING.TEXT: When I load a saved flight, I can't access the menu bar on top that normally appears/disappears. It doesn't show up at all. Anyone else seeing this?

WRITING.TITLE: Slow Down Slew Mode?
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a way to make smaller movements in Slew Mode? Using the number keys left/right and forward/backward, the plane moves too far each time. In FSX slew mode, you had a cockpit view and could move slow or fast, depending on what you wanted.
So I set up slew to all 4 axis on the stick?
Seems like this changes every time a saved flight is loaded.
Got it set up - thanks. I have forward/backward and left/right set to the Thrustmaster stick axis', and up and down set to keys Q and A like in FSX. Thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: Found A Good Way To View Outside of Plane
WRITING.TEXT: I was finally able to figure out how to view the outside of the plane from various angles without the drone camera. I have 3 keyboard keys set up. One is for "Toggle External View Freelock (Hold). The others are for External View Look Left (Lockable) and External View Look Right (Lockable). If you hold the Freelock key down, you can then rotate the outside view left or right with the other 2 keys. The view will then hold until you change it again. Works great for me!

WRITING.TITLE: Live Traffic Question
WRITING.TEXT: Still not sure how live traffic works. I'm seeing foreign liveries on large planes at my local airport. All we have in real life is regional jets for American Eagle and United Express. Are those supposed to show up instead of the large foreign jets? Also, can someone explain the use of generic AI planes instead of real planes in Options? What is the difference as to what shows up in the sim?
Most everyone has this in Content Manager. Not sure what it's for.

WRITING.TITLE: No External Camera Quickviews After Patch
WRITING.TEXT: Just installed the patch. I see I have no External Camera Quickviews from the top toolbar any longer. Before if you chose External Camera, you would have about 8 quickviews in a dropdown list. That list doesn't appear now, and just shows a blank space. Anyone else seeing this?

WRITING.TITLE: AI Traffic Liveries Backwards?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm using real planes for AI Traffic. I notice the airline names appear backwards until I get real close to the planes, then the liveries change to appear correctly. Anyone seeing this? How to fix?
Are they still in your Community folder? Mine all seem to be there and still working.
I'll have to check.

WRITING.TITLE: Liveries Appear Backward
WRITING.TEXT: I'm now getting a pretty good variety of airlines and planes for AI in Live Traffic. But the livery titles on the planes still appear backwards until I get pretty close to them, then they switch to appear normal. Anyone else seeing this? What would cause this? Never happened in FSX.

WRITING.TITLE: How To Adjust Settings For More FPS?
WRITING.TEXT: I have an Alienware from 2015 with an i7 CPU and 16 GB of RAM. GPU is an NV 980. Now that people have been using the sim for a few weeks, what have you found to be the best settings to turn down to gain a few more fps and stop all stuttering?

WRITING.TITLE: Zendesk Request Not Submitted?
WRITING.TEXT: Tried to submit a request to Zendesk. When I clicked submit, it said request not submitted - check your email. I did and nothing from them. Now what?
I solved this. Microsoft doesn't recognize my roadrunner email. Had to use a secondary one.
That is an excellent site. It really helped me smooth out my flying.

For those of you trying to replicate the W key in FSX to show a cockpit view with no instruments, I found a partial solution. In Options, there are 3 cockpit camera selections. If you choose Toggle Landing View, it shows a pretty clear view out the window with the instruments still showing a little on the bottom. I'll use this until we get a totally open cockpit view in an update hopefully. Also, you can zoom in and out with the cockpit view using the mouse scroll wheel.
What is the easiest way to operate the drone? I haven't tried it yet.

I got it working. But it freezes when going from drone mode to cockpit and back to drone. The drone view is still there, but the keys don't work anymore to move it. I have to go to the main menu and start a new flight for it to work again. How do I fix this?
Trying to pin down what situation causes it.
Make sure you're putting the correct livery folder in community. Some liveries have a main folder and a subfolder. You only need to put the subfolder in Community for it to work.
Still having the problem. Happens when going from External back to Showcase.

WRITING.TITLE: Drone Issues
WRITING.TEXT: I'm having a couple issues using the drone. I got it working. But it freezes when going from drone mode (Showcase) to External and back to drone. The drone view is still there, but the keys don't work anymore to move it. I have to go to the main menu and start a new flight for it to work again. How do I fix this? Also, how do you rotate the drone? I see setting for drone rotation speed, but not how to actually rotate it.
This happens a lot for me. Still not sure how to rotate the drone with a joystick or keyboard.
Looks like 7 or 9 just rolls the drone left or right. To me rotate means it could look around 360 degrees. Is there a way to do this?

I'm still seeing the livery titles on real traffic planes show up backwards. They change to appear correctly only when you get real close to the planes. I've submitted this to Zendesk, but no answers yet. I don't think I'm the only person with this issue?
I added those same planes. They show up and work for me. I think you need to go thru all the planes in Aircraft Selection to find them.

This project is being worked on: [https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/live-traffic-with-working-liveries/287626?u=bigbabykp](https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/live-traffic-with-working-liveries/287626?u=bigbabykp)
That's the one that uses IVAO. Doesn't work too well for me. Just puts foreign planes at gates. And you still have only generics flying. There is supposed to be an update this week though.

WRITING.TITLE: Increase Default Drone Speed?
WRITING.TEXT: The default drone speed is about 4%. Is there a way to increase the default to around 50% or higher?
